name: Mastermind Modus

pages.text: Someone recommended a puzzle modus. Well, there it is. A classic game of mastermind, fully portable.$(br)Everytime something is retrieved, there's a different code. Failure to guess leads to item loss!
Combine any modus card and a Bucket of Paint in a Punch Designix.

pages: What's that, you want to know what grists are shown?$(br)$(li)Blue Chalk, a rare blue version of chalk.$(li)Crimsite, an advanced grist for end-game tools.$(li)Slurry, a late-game byproduct of alchemy that uses uranium.$(li)$(k)null$(), a buggy grist that destroys all grist it touches.$(li)Citrine, a gemstone, despite its texture.$(li)Antibuild, a removed grist that used to be for breaking blocks.
